[[Annatar]] counsels [[Celebrimbor]].|Official Synopsis, [[Amazon Studios]]}} '''The Eagle and the Sceptre''' is the eleventh episode of [[Amazon Studios]]'s television series, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]''. It is the third episode of the second season and it was released on [[29 August]], [[2024]]. ==Synopsis== == Cast == === Credited === :''In order of appearance'' (in episode credits) {| class="wikitable" |- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" !
